name: Tuskboy
description:
This is a tech and art demo for Tuskboy, a coming-of-age fantasy RPG with deckbuilding elements that I want to make in the future.  It currently contains the 3D cel-shaded aesthetic I want to go for as well as dialogue and a rudimentary combat system. 

Music Credits: 

Exploration & Indoor Themes: Stacy Chang

Combat Music: SNES BGM Music Pack( https://pudretediablo.itch.io/snes-bgm-1 )
